   text-align: center;

Let's create a plot with a caption below it:

```{r, fig.align="center", fig.width=6, fig.height=6, fig.cap="Figure: Here is a really important caption.", message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

mpg %>%
  ggplot( aes(x=reorder(class, hwy), y=hwy, fill=class)) + 
    geom_boxplot() +
    xlab("class") +
    theme(legend.position="none")
```
